nxt

Class EconomicClustering

  • java.lang.Object
    • nxt.EconomicClustering

  • public final class EconomicClustering
extends java.lang.Object
    Economic Clustering concept (EC) solves the most critical flaw of "classical" Proof-of-Stake - the problem called "Nothing-at-Stake". I ought to respect BCNext's wish and say that this concept is inspired by Economic Majority idea of Meni Rosenfeld (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/User:Meni_Rosenfeld). EC is a vital part of Transparent Forging. Words "Mining in Nxt relies on cooperation of people and even forces it" (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=553205.0) were said about EC. Keep in mind that this concept has not been peer reviewed. You are very welcome to do it... Come-from-Beyond (21.05.2014)
